Installation¶

You have the option to install an official release or to build the development version.

Python version support¶

Officially Python 2.7.

Binary installers¶

All platforms¶

Preliminary builds and installers on the OpenFisca download page.

Dependencies¶

  • NumPy: 1.6.1 or higher
  • python-dateutil 1.5
  • matplotlib: for plotting

TODO: complete this list

  • PyTables: necessary for HDF5-based storage

  • openpyxl, xlrd/xlwt
    • openpyxl version 1.6.1 or higher
    • Needed for Excel I/O

Note

Without the optional dependencies, many useful features will not work. Hence, it is highly recommended that you install these.

Installing from source¶

The source code is hosted at http://github.com/openfisca/openfisca, it can be checked out using git and compiled / installed like so:

git clone git://github.com/openfisca/openfisca.git
cd src

Some informations are available on the OpenFisca website.
